account-transaction-list.title: Account

pending-transactions.label: Pending Transactions
pending-transactions.text: Pending transactions are currently not enabled, please refer to the blockexplorer.

account-transaction-list.tx_not_loading: The transactions can currently not be loaded, please refer to the block explorer to view the latest transactions

has-delegated_card.heading: {{amount}} Delegated
has-delegated_card.text: Your XTZ are delegated and being baked, you can check your rewards for each cycle.

not-delegated_card.heading: Delegate Tezos
not-delegated_card.text: You have {{amount}} undelegated. If you delegate now you can earn a share each cycle.

migrate-babylon_card.heading: Account Migration
migrate-babylon_card.text: Delegatable kt accounts have been deprecated, to redelegate transfer your XTZs to your tz account.

migrate-alert.message: Do you want to transfer {{amount}} from this KT address to its corresponding XTZ address?

account-transaction-list.no-transactions_text: There are no transactions yet for this account.

introduction.title: Self custody made simple and secure

highest.label: Highest Security
highest.text: With the AirGap two device approach secure key handling becomes more accessible.
highest.desktop_text: AirGap has a two device approach where the secret is stored either in AirGap Vault or for selected coins on a Ledger hardware wallet.

medium.label: Medium Security
medium.text: With the AirGap two app approach secure key handling becomes more accessible.

vault.heading: AirGap Vault
vault.text: The private key is generated and securely stored on another device with the AirGap Vault app. You have to install AirGap Vault to use AirGap Wallet
vault.desktop_text:
The private key is generated and securely stored on another device with the AirGap Vault app or on a Ledger hardware wallet.
Install AirGap Vault on a mobile device or connect a Ledger to use AirGap Wallet

wallet.heading: AirGap Wallet
wallet.text: This is the AirGap Wallet application, that deals with only public information and is responsible for broadcasting transactions to the blockchain.

introduction-download.title: Install AirGap Vault
introduction-download.heading: Let's install AirGap Vault!
introduction-download.description: Not sure how and where to install AirGap Vault and AirGap Wallet? We have a detailed step by step guide with all the instructions.
introduction-download.text: There are a few ways to install AirGap Vault, choose the one that fits the best for you.
introduction-download.play-store_text: Install AirGap Vault directly from the Google Play Store for this or a dedicated device.
introduction-download.app-store_text: Install AirGap Vault directly from the App Store for this or a dedicated device.
introduction-download.iOS-device-iOS_text: Install AirGap Vault from the App Store on this device.
introduction-download.iOS-device-android_text: Install AirGap Vault from the Play Store on a dedicated device.
introduction-download.android-device-iOS_text: Install AirGap Vault from the App Store on a dedicated device.
introduction-download.android-device-android_text: Install AirGap Vault from the Play Store on this device.
introduction-download.install-distro_text: Install AirGap Vault Distribution on a dedicated computer for signing transactions air gapped.

portfolio.empty-state_text: Start by adding coins to AirGap Wallet, you will also need the AirGap Vault application where your secret is securely stored.
portfolio.empty-state_desktop_text: Start by adding coins to AirGap Wallet, you can either do this with the AirGap Vault application or for selected coins with a Ledger hardware wallet.

scan.title: Scan QR
scan.text: Scan a sync QR to add an account or scan a transaction QR to confirm and send it.
scan.multi-qr_text: This transaction consists of multiple QR codes. Keep your camera on the changing QRs and wait until all codes are scanned.
scan.empty-state_heading: In order to scan QR codes, AirGap Wallet needs the camera permission.

scan-address.title: Scan Account Address
scan-address.text: Scan the QR code of an account address.

scan-sync.title: Sync Account Data
scan-sync.text: Open AirGap Vault, select an account and then Sync, scan the Sync QR code with AirGap Wallet.
scan-sync.description: No private keys or any non-public data will be shared during this process.

select-account.title: Select Account
select-account.text: Select an account for the Chrome Extension

select-wallet.title: Select Account

scanned-address.text: You've scanned an address. Select one of the following accounts to send from.

xtz_shielded.text: Select one of the following accounts to fund your Shielded Tez account.
The Sapling transaction needs to be broadcast from a Tezos account. Select a Tezos account to sign the transaction in the Vault and ultimately broadcast the Sapling transaction.

select-wallet.compatible_label: These accounts appear to be compatible
select-wallet.incompatible_label: These accounts appear to be incompatible

web-extension-disclaimer.heading: This is a ALPHA version, only use with small amounts of funds.
web-extension-disclaimer.text: The extesion has been currently tested with.
web-extension-disclaimer.description: Other platforms or dapps might work, we would be really grateful for every input, issue report or feature request.

transaction-confirm.title: Confirm Transaction
transaction-confirm.qr-data-too-big_warning: The QR code could not be created, the transaction's data is too big

tx-broadcasting.heading: Status: Broadcasting..
tx-broadcasting.text: Your transaction is being broadcasted, this might take a few seconds.

tx-pending.heading: Status: Pending..
tx-pending.text: Depending on the fee you've set, it might take a few minutes until the transaction is confirmed.

error.address_label: Looks like a wrong address format, it should start with {{addressPlaceholder}}

transaction-qr.title: Transaction QR
transaction-qr.text: Open AirGap Vault and scan this transaction in order to sign it.

interaction-selection.title: Vault Interaction
interaction-selection.heading: How would you like to interact with AirGap Vault?
interaction-selection.same-device_info: AirGap Vault and AirGap Wallet are installed on the same device.
interaction-selection.offline-device_info: AirGap Vault is installed on an offline device, scan the QR code with AirGap Wallet.

interaction-selection-desktop.title: Select Signer Option
interaction-selection-desktop.heading: Select the device to sign this transaction
interaction-selection-desktop.vault_info: AirGap Vault is installed on an offline device, scan the QR code with AirGap Wallet.
interaction-selection-desktop.ledger_info: Ledger has multiple types of hardware wallets that are connected to your device to securely sign transactions.

account-import.title: Confirm Import
account-import.import-text: Would you like to import the following accounts?
account-import.warning: You have already added this account in AirGap.

account-activate.title: Add Accounts
account-activate.message: Select {{ protocol }} accounts to add. TODO: import more from AirGap Vault

signed-transaction.transaction-unreadable: We were not able to extract information from this transaction. This does not mean that the transaction is invalid - Please make sure that you know what you are doing, and you can verify that you know that this transaction contains the correct data.

account-edit-popover-component.message: Do you want to remove this account? You can always sync it again from your vault.

add-sub-account.title: Add {{ typeLabel }}
add-sub-account.delegation_heading: In order to delegate your XTZ, you have to import or create a new account first before you can delegate.

add-account_card.heading: Create Account
add-account_card.text: If you want to add a new Tezos Account, a fee of ~0.260 XTZ has to be paid.

sub-account-select.title: Select Account
sub-account-select.text: Select the Account you want to delegate. You will need to sign a transaction to confirm the delegation.

account-import-onboarding.title: Add {{protocolName}}
account-import-onboarding.text: You need the AirGap Vault application to add {{protocolName}}. Follow the instructions on the next few steps.
account-import-onboarding.sub-protocol_text: {{subProtocol}} can not be added without a {{protocol}} account.

slide-0.text: {{protocol}} has many tokens. To use any of them, you need to first first add a {{protocol}} account from AirGap Vault
slide-0.description: Follow the instructions on the next few steps to add a {{protocol}} account before you can continue

slide-1.text: Open your AirGap Vault application, on the same device or on your offline device.
slide-1.description: Go to the “Accounts” tab and select “Add Account”.

slides.slide-2_text: Select the created account and on the “Account Address” page choose “Sync Account”.

slide-3.text: You need to sync the account from AirGap Vault to AirGap Wallet.
slide-3.description:
¬ If AirGap Vault is on an offline device, scan the QR code on the next page.
¬ If AirGap Vault is on the same device, use the same device sync button.

slide-4.text: The account can now be imported to AirGap Wallet.
slide-4.description: You’re now ready to create {{protocolName}} transactions with AirGap Vault and AirGap Wallet.

account-import-ledger-onboarding.title: Add {{protocolName}}
account-import-ledger-onboarding.text: You need a Ledger device with the {{protocolName}} application installed to add {{protocolName}}. Follow the instructions on the next few steps.

slides.slide-1: Connect your Ledger to your computer and unlock it by entering the pin code.
slides.slide-2: Open the {{protocolName}} app on your Ledger.
slides.slide-3: Confirm to share your {{protocolName}} address with AirGap Wallet.

error.message: Please make sure your Ledger is plugged into the computer, unlocked and the {{protocolName}} app is open.

sub-account-import.title: Select Accounts
sub-account-import.text: Select the Account you want to add for {{subProtocolName}}.
sub-account-import.empty_text: You have added all {{tokenName}} accounts for all your accounts

onboarding.heading: You can exchange your Ethereum to Bitcoin and do other exchanges.
onboarding.description: Easily swap all supported crypto currencies directly inside AirGap.

no-currencies.heading: In order to exchange, you need at least two currencies in AirGap like Ethereum and Bitcoin.
no-currencies.description: Before you can easily swap currencies in AirGap you need to add at least two different ones.

loading.message: It seems that no exchange could currently be set up, please excuse the inconvenience and try again later

swap.currently_not_supported: The selected trading pair is currently not supported
swap.amount-higher-than-balance-error_label: The amount you entered is higher than your account balance {{accountBalance}}

exchange-confirm.title: Confirm Exchange
exchange-confirm.heading: This is your Exchange summary, you need to sign it with AirGap Vault to complete the exchange.
exchange-confirm.disclaimer: Exchange services provided by Changelly. By clicking Confirm Exchange, I acknowledge and understand that my transaction may trigger AML/KYC verification according to Changelly AML/KYC.
exchange-confirm.changelly_disclaimer: Exchange services provided by Changelly. By clicking Confirm Exchange, I acknowledge and understand that my transaction may trigger AML/KYC verification according to Changelly AML/KYC.
exchange-confirm.changenow_disclaimer: Exchange services provided by ChangeNow. By clicking Confirm Exchange, I acknowledge and understand that my transaction may trigger AML/KYC verification according to ChangeNow AML/KYC.

exchange-custom.title: Select a Gatekeeper
exchange-custom.text: Exchange to tzBTC is not directly supported in AirGap yet but you can swap at one of the following Gatekeepers.
exchange-custom.heading: In-App tzBTC swap not yet supported

bitcoin-suisse.title: Bitcoin Suisse
bitcoin-suisse.text: Founded in 2013, Bitcoin Suisse has been a pioneer in providing crypto-financial services. Bitcoin Suisse has helped to shape the crypto-and blockchain-ecosystem in Switzerland. To receive TZBTC, you need to be fully onboarded as customer incl. all KYC /AML documentation. The minimum amount for trading with Bitcoin Suisse is 1 BTC or 1 TZBTC. Trading fees apply for each transaction.

bity.title: Bity
bity.text: Founded in 2014, Bity SA is a leading crypto-financial services provider. It was founded on the conviction that blockchains, and other technologies for decentralization, will have some of the most profound social implications in history. As a regulated Swiss financial intermediary, Bity offers crypto-financial services and products for individuals and businesses globally, empowering people to always be in complete control of their own funds.

sygnum.title: Sygnum
sygnum.text: Sygnum is the world’s first digital asset bank, and a digital asset specialist with global reach. Sygnum offers a portfolio of regulated banking services which seamlessly integrates traditional and digital assets into one account, including major national currencies, Bitcoin, Ethereum, a Digital CHF and asset tokens. Founded on Swiss and Singapore heritage, Sygnum empowers institutional clients to invest in the digital asset economy with complete trust.

taurus.title: Taurus
taurus.text: Taurus Group SA is a leading Swiss company in digital assets and blockchain. It was founded by senior executives with a background in banking, IT, cybersecurity and regulation. Taurus offers enterprise-grade financial market infrastructure solutions for digital assets as well as financial services to institutional clients.

woorton.title: Woorton
woorton.text: Woorton provides 24/7 cryptocurrency liquidity via API or voice trading. Their bank-grade trading infrastructure allows them to deploy capital on exchanges with proprietary trading algorithms and enhance the liquidity of all types of assets. They offer seamless access to digital assets and provide investors, brokerage desks and payments providers around the world. Woorton provides liquidity in tzBTC against 20 currencies including BTC, ETH, USD, EUR, CHF, GBP, stablecoins and more.

exchange-custom.disclaimer: Exchange services provided by Changelly. By clicking Confirm Exchange, I acknowledge and understand that my transaction may trigger AML/KYC verification according to Changelly AML/KYC.

delegation-list.title: {{ delegateeLabelPlural }} List
delegation-list.not-supported_text: Currently the {{ delegateeLabelPlural }} list is not yet supported but you can manually delegate to an address with "Change Validator" in the three-dot menu.

delegate.label: Delegate
delegate.has-delegated_text: You have currently {{ delegated }} delegated to this validator.
delegate.not-delegated_text: Select the amount you want to delegate.
delegate.can-delegate-has-delegated_text: You can additionally delegate up to {{ maxDelegation }} (after transaction fees).
delegate.can-delegate-not-delegated_text: You can delegate up to {{ maxDelegation }} (after transaction fees).

undelegate.text: You have currently delegated to this validator, you can undelegate up to {{ delegated }}.

rewards.label: Rewards
rewards.text: You can claim up to {{ rewards }} in rewards for this delegation.

delegation-detail-tezos.payout-schedule-every-cycle-last-rewards: Every {{ payoutTime }} <small>Every cycle, rewards from last cycle</small>
delegation-detail-tezos.payout-schedule-every-cycle-delayed-rewa: Every {{ payoutTime }} <small>Every cycle, rewards from {{ payoutDelay }} cycles ago</small>

delegate.label: Delegate
delegate.bond-nominate_text: Select the amount you want to delegate. You can delegate at least {{ minDelegation }} up to {{ maxDelegation }} (after transaction fees).
delegate.bond-nominate-no-max_text: Select the amount you want to delegate.
delegate.rebond-nominate_text: Select the amount you want to delegate. You can delegate up to {{ maxDelegation }} (after transaction fees).
delegate.rebond-nominate-no-max_text: Select the amount you want to delegate.
delegate.nominate_text: Delegate to this validator. You have currently {{ bonded }} bonded.
delegate.bond-extra_text: You have currently {{ bonded }} delegated. You can additionally delegate up to {{ maxDelegation }} (after transaction fees).
delegate.bond-extra-no-max_text: You have currently {{ bonded }} delegated. You can delegate additional {{ symbol }}s.
delegate.rebond-extra_text: You have currently {{ bonded }} delegated. You can additionally delegate up to {{ maxDelegation }} (after transaction fees).
delegate.rebond-extra-no-max_text: You have currently {{ bonded }} delegated. You can delegate additional {{ symbol }}s.
delegate.change-nomination_text: Change your delegation. You have currently {{ bonded }} delegated.
delegate.unsufficient-funds_text: You don't have enough {{ symbol }} to cover the transaction fees, additional {{ extra }} are required.

withdraw-unbonded.label: Withdraw Unboded
withdraw-unbonded.text-full: You can withdraw {{ unlocked }} of unbonded funds.

delegation-issues.title: Delegations on Polkadot
delegation-issues.description: A dynamic minimum amount of DOT is required to be eligible to receive rewards on Polkadot at this time. The amount changes every day. Please read the Polkadot blogpost for more info.

election-open.title: Delegation operations currently unavailable
election-open.description: Due to the election period restrictions the delegation operations are currently unavailable.

nomination-inactive.title: Your delegation to this validator is inactive
nomination-inactive.description: The validator has been elected to be in the validator set, however, your nomination has not been selected to be active in this era and you won't get any rewards.

nomination-oversubscribed.title: This validator is oversubscribed
nomination-oversubscribed.description: Validators can only pay out to 256 nominators per era. If more than 256 nominators nominate the same validator, it is "oversubscribed", and only the top 256 staked nominators are paid rewards. You won't get any rewards in this era.

validator-oversubscribed.title: This validator is oversubscribed
validator-oversubscribed.description: Validators can only pay out to 256 nominators per era. If more than 256 nominators nominate the same validator, it is "oversubscribed", and only the top 256 staked nominators are paid rewards.

delegate.label: Delegate
delegate.has-delegated_text: You have currently {{ delegated }} delegated to this collator.
delegate.not-delegated_text: Select the amount you want to delegate.
delegate.can-delegate-has-delegated_text: You can additionally delegate up to {{ maxDelegation }} (after transaction fees).
delegate.can-delegate-not-delegated_text: You can delegate up to {{ maxDelegation }} (after transaction fees).

undelegate.label: Undelegate
undelegate.text: You have currently delegated to this collatorr, you can undelegate up to {{ delegated }}.

introduction-push.title: Push Notifications
introduction-push.heading: You can receive push notifications if your accounts receive transactions.
introduction-push.description: First you have to grant AirGap Wallet the push notification permission.

voting.title: Voting
voting.heading: Block Reward Initiative (BRI)
voting.text: To transform aeternity into a self-sustaining platform, we propose the Block Reward Initiative (BRI), through which ~0-20% of miner rewards will be allocated to development.

further-information.heading: Further Information
further-information.result_label: To check your vote, please visit the official voting page

voting.vote-no_label: You've voted: I am NOT supporting the BRI

change-alert.text: Enter the address provided to you by the {{ delegateeLabel }}.

delegation-validator-list.title: Validator List
delegation-validator-list.no_validators_found_label: No validators matching your search have been found

action-alert-tip.heading: Thank you for using AirGap!
action-alert-tip.text: We've seen you have been using AirGap a lot recently. Would you like to support development of our app by tipping us?

action-alert-delegation.heading: Thank you for using AirGap!
action-alert-delegation.text: We noticed that you have XTZ funds that are not delegated. By delegating your funds, you can earn up to 7% yearly interest! Would you like to delegate your funds now?

ledger-sign.title: {{title}} Transaction Details
ledger-sign.text: Connect the Ledger device and sign the transaction.

error-alert.unknown: Unkown error has occurred. Try reconnecting your device.

airgap-vault.label: AirGap Vault
airgap-vault.text: AirGap Vault can be installed on an offline smartphone or on the same device to securely sign transactions.

ledger.label: Ledger
ledger.text: Ledger has multiple types of hardware wallets that are connected to your device to securely sign transactions.

beacon-request.blake2b_hash: Ledger Blake2b hash of the message
